post:
**Do you searching highspeed vps based on KVM and Hardware Raid 10 with 1 Gbit/s? No problem, we can do that!**
**Location:** Jena, Germany

Special LEB offer with promotion code: Use "lowendtalk" for 50% discount on the first month!
Some benchmarks? We love serverbear: http://serverbear.com/1243-powerbox-micro-filemedia#benchmarks
Test IP or speedfiles: http://lg.filemedia.net

**VPS offer: PowerBox Micro (https://www.filemedia.de/powerbox_micro.php) @ 3,49€ (discount price 1,75€) per month (with VAT) no setup fee**
**[Order here!](https://www.filemedia.de/manager/cart.php?a=confproduct&i=0)**

CPU: 500 MHz
RAM: 256 MB
HDD: 15 GB @ Hardware Raid10
Traffic: 1 TB mit 1 Gbit/s (after that 10 Mbit/s with Flat)
Linux, Windows, FreeBSD,... Support
IP-addresses: 1x (additional 1,49€/month)
Guarantee ressources: yes!
Additional hdd for omv or other? No problem!
Full-KVM 
VNC (KVM over IP)
KVM templates support with Windows, Linux,..
Lot´s of iso files like Windows, Proxmox, Openmediavault,..
SolusVM webpanel

**Hardware node specs:**
Intel Xeon E3-1230v2 or E3-1270v2
Hardware Raid 10 with 12x hdds
2x 1 Gbit/s network connectivity
Supermicro based servers
Own hardware!

**Any questions, contact us per livechat, ticket or in this thread!**
